definitions.definition: A person with a personality disorder indicated by a pattern of lying , cunning , manipulating , glibness , exploiting , heedlessness , arrogance , delusions of grandeur , carelessness , low self-control , disregard for morality , lack of acceptance of responsibility , callousness , and lack of empathy and remorse . Such a person may be especially prone to violent and criminal offenses .
A person with no moral conscience .
A person who perpetrates especially gruesome or bizarre violent acts.
A person diagnosed with antisocial or dissocial personality disorder.
A person diagnosed with any mental disorder .
